# Scraping Plane Crash Info

In class, we scraped the <http://www.planecrashinfo.com/2022/2022.htm> as follows:

```{r}
pacman::p_load(rvest)
step0 = "http://www.planecrashinfo.com/2022/2022.htm"
step1 = read_html(step0)
step2 = html_element(step1, 'table')
step3 = html_table(step2)
step3 # printing the results for step3
```
